00040 
00041 NormalizedSquaredError::NormalizedSquaredError(MultilayerPerceptron* newMultilayerPerceptron, 
00042 InputTargetDataSet* newInputTargetDataSet)
00043 : ObjectiveFunctional(newMultilayerPerceptron)
00044 {
00045    inputTargetDataSet = newInputTargetDataSet; 
00046 
00047    Matrix<double> meanAndStandardDeviationOfTargetData 
00048    = inputTargetDataSet->calculateMeanAndStandardDeviationOfTargetData(); 
00049 
00050    meanOfTargetData = meanAndStandardDeviationOfTargetData.getRow(0);
00051 }
00052

00067 {
00068    inputTargetDataSet = NULL;
00069 }

00094 // void setInputTargetDataSet(InputTargetDataSet*) method

00099 
00100 void NormalizedSquaredError::setInputTargetDataSet(InputTargetDataSet* newInputTargetDataSet)
00101 {
00102    inputTargetDataSet = newInputTargetDataSet;
00103    
00104    Matrix<double> meanAndStandardDeviationOfTargetData 
00105    = inputTargetDataSet->calculateMeanAndStandardDeviationOfTargetData(); 
00106 
00107    meanOfTargetData = meanAndStandardDeviationOfTargetData.getRow(0);   
00108 }

00111 // double calculateEvaluation(void) method
00112 
00117 
00118 double NormalizedSquaredError::calculateEvaluation(void)
00119 {
00120     // Control sentence 
00121 
00122    if(multilayerPerceptron == NULL)
00123    {
00124       std::cerr << std::endl
00125                 << "Flood Error: NormalizedSquaredError class." << std::endl
00126                 << "double calculateEvaluation(void) method." << std::endl
00127                 << "Pointer to multilayer perceptron object cannot be NULL." << std::endl
00128                 << std::endl;
00129 
00130         exit(1);
00131    }
00132    else if(inputTargetDataSet == NULL)
00133    {
00134       std::cerr << std::endl
00135                 << "Flood Error: NormalizedSquaredError class." << std::endl
00136                 << "double calculateEvaluation(void) method." << std::endl
00137                 << "Pointer to input-target data set object cannot be NULL." << std::endl
00138                 << std::endl;
00139 
00140         exit(1);
00141    }
00142 
00143 
00144    double normalizedSquaredError = 0.0;       
00145 
00146    // Multilayer perceptron
00147 
00148    int numberOfInputs = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfInputs();
00149    int numberOfOutputs = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfOutputs();
00150 
00151    // Input-target data set
00152 
00153    int numberOfSamples = inputTargetDataSet->getNumberOfSamples();
00154    int numberOfInputVariables = inputTargetDataSet->getNumberOfInputVariables();
00155    int numberOfTargetVariables = inputTargetDataSet->getNumberOfTargetVariables();
00156 
00157    Matrix<double>& inputData = inputTargetDataSet->getInputData();
00158    Matrix<double>& targetData = inputTargetDataSet->getTargetData();
00159 
00160    if(numberOfInputs != numberOfInputVariables || numberOfOutputs != numberOfTargetVariables)
00161    {
00162       std::cout << std::endl
00163                 << "Flood Error NormalizedSquaredError class." << std::endl
00164                                 << "double calculateEvaluation(void) method." << std::endl
00165                 << "Number of inputs and outputs in multilayer perceptron must be equal to " 
00166                 << std::endl
00167                 << "number of input and output variables in input-target data set." 
00168                 << std::endl << std::endl;
00169 
00170       exit(1);
00171    }
00172 
00173    // Increment number of evaluations
00174 
00175    numberOfEvaluations++;
00176 
00177    Vector<double> input(numberOfInputs);
00178    Vector<double> output(numberOfOutputs);
00179    Vector<double> target(numberOfTargetVariables);
00180 
00181    double sumSquaredError = 0.0;
00182    double sumSquaredNorm = 0.0;
00183 
00184    for(int sample = 0; sample < numberOfSamples; sample++)
00185    {
00186       // Input vector
00187 
00188       input = inputData.getRow(sample);
00189 
00190       // Output vector
00191 
00192       output = multilayerPerceptron->calculateOutput(input);
00193 
00194       // Target vector
00195 
00196       target = targetData.getRow(sample);
00197 
00198       // Sum squared error
00199 
00200       sumSquaredError += (output-target).dot(output-target);
00201 
00202       // Sum squared norm
00203 
00204       sumSquaredNorm += (target-meanOfTargetData).dot(target-meanOfTargetData);
00205    }
00206 
00207    normalizedSquaredError = sumSquaredError/sumSquaredNorm;
00208 
00209    return(normalizedSquaredError);
00210 }

00213 // Vector<double> calculateGradient(void)
00214 
00219 
00220 Vector<double> NormalizedSquaredError::calculateGradient(void)
00221 {
00222    // Multilayer perceptron 
00223 
00224    int numberOfInputs = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfInputs();
00225 
00226    int numberOfHiddenLayers = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfHiddenLayers();
00227    Vector<int> numbersOfHiddenNeurons = multilayerPerceptron->getNumbersOfHiddenNeurons();
00228 
00229    int numberOfOutputs = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfOutputs();
00230 
00231    MultilayerPerceptron::PreAndPostProcessingMethod preAndPostProcessingMethod
00232    = multilayerPerceptron->getPreAndPostProcessingMethod();
00233 
00234    Vector<double> meanOfOutputVariables = multilayerPerceptron->getMeanOfOutputVariables();
00235    Vector<double> standardDeviationOfOutputVariables = multilayerPerceptron->getStandardDeviationOfOutputVariables();
00236 
00237    Vector<double> minimumOfOutputVariables = multilayerPerceptron->getMinimumOfOutputVariables();
00238    Vector<double> maximumOfOutputVariables = multilayerPerceptron->getMaximumOfOutputVariables();
00239 
00240    Vector<Perceptron>& outputLayer = multilayerPerceptron->getOutputLayer();
00241    Vector< Vector<Perceptron> >& hiddenLayers = multilayerPerceptron->getHiddenLayers();
00242 
00243    int numberOfNeuralParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfNeuralParameters();
00244    Vector<double> synapticWeights;
00245 
00246    // Input-target data set
00247 
00248    int numberOfSamples = inputTargetDataSet->getNumberOfSamples();
00249    int numberOfTargetVariables = inputTargetDataSet->getNumberOfTargetVariables();
00250 
00251    Matrix<double>& inputData = inputTargetDataSet->getInputData();
00252    Matrix<double>& targetData = inputTargetDataSet->getTargetData();
00253 
00254    Vector<double> target(numberOfTargetVariables);
00255 
00256    // Input, outputs, gradient
00257 
00258    Vector<double> input(numberOfInputs);
00259    Vector<double> inputSignal(numberOfInputs);
00260    Vector< Vector<double> > netInputSignalToHiddenLayer(numberOfHiddenLayers);
00261    Vector< Vector<double> > outputSignalFromHiddenLayer(numberOfHiddenLayers);
00262    Vector< Vector<double> > outputSignalDerivativeFromHiddenLayer(numberOfHiddenLayers);
00263    Vector<double> netInputSignalToOutputLayer(numberOfOutputs);
00264    Vector<double> outputSignal(numberOfOutputs);
00265    Vector<double> output(numberOfOutputs);
00266    Vector<double> gradient(numberOfNeuralParameters, 0.0);
00267 
00268    // Output and hidden errors
00269 
00270    Vector<double> outputError(numberOfOutputs);
00271    Vector< Vector<double> > hiddenError(numberOfHiddenLayers);
00272 
00273    for(int h = 0; h < numberOfHiddenLayers; h++)
00274    {
00275       hiddenError[h].setSize(numbersOfHiddenNeurons[h]);
00276    }
00277 
00278    // Main loop
00279 
00280    double sum;
00281    int index;
00282 
00283    for(int sample = 0; sample < numberOfSamples; sample++)
00284    {
00285       // Actual input
00286 
00287       input = inputData.getRow(sample);
00288 
00289       // Preprocess input to obtain input signal to the neural network 
00290 
00291       inputSignal = multilayerPerceptron->preprocessInput(input);
00292 
00293       // Calculate net input output and output signal derivative from all hidden layers
00294 
00295       netInputSignalToHiddenLayer[0] 
00296       = multilayerPerceptron->calculateNetInputSignalToHiddenLayer(0, inputSignal);
00297 
00298       outputSignalFromHiddenLayer[0] 
00299       = multilayerPerceptron->calculateOutputSignalFromHiddenLayer(0, netInputSignalToHiddenLayer[0]);
00300 
00301       outputSignalDerivativeFromHiddenLayer[0] 
00302       = multilayerPerceptron->calculateOutputSignalDerivativeFromHiddenLayer(0, netInputSignalToHiddenLayer[0]);
00303   
00304       for(int h = 1; h < numberOfHiddenLayers; h++)
00305       {
00306          netInputSignalToHiddenLayer[h] = multilayerPerceptron
00307          ->calculateNetInputSignalToHiddenLayer(h, outputSignalFromHiddenLayer[h-1]);
00308    
00309          outputSignalFromHiddenLayer[h] = multilayerPerceptron
00310          ->calculateOutputSignalFromHiddenLayer(h, netInputSignalToHiddenLayer[h]);
00311 
00312          outputSignalDerivativeFromHiddenLayer[h] = multilayerPerceptron
00313          ->calculateOutputSignalDerivativeFromHiddenLayer(h, netInputSignalToHiddenLayer[h]);         
00314       }
00315 
00316       // Get net input signal to output layer
00317 
00318       netInputSignalToOutputLayer = multilayerPerceptron
00319       ->calculateNetInputSignalToOutputLayer(outputSignalFromHiddenLayer[numberOfHiddenLayers-1]);
00320 
00321       // Get actual output signal from output layer
00322 
00323       Vector<double> outputSignal = multilayerPerceptron->calculateOutputSignal(netInputSignalToOutputLayer);
00324 
00325       // Get actual output signal derivative from output layer
00326 
00327       Vector<double> outputSignalDerivative
00328       = multilayerPerceptron->calculateOutputSignalDerivative(netInputSignalToOutputLayer);
00329 
00330       // Postprocess output signal from the neural network to get output
00331 
00332       Vector<double> output = multilayerPerceptron->postprocessOutputSignal(outputSignal);
00333 
00334       // Actual target
00335 
00336       Vector<double> target = targetData.getRow(sample);
00337 
00338       // Evaluate the error for all the output units      
00339 
00340       switch(preAndPostProcessingMethod)
00341       {
00342          case MultilayerPerceptron::None:             
00343          {
00344              outputError = outputSignalDerivative*(output-target)*2.0;
00345          }
00346 
00347          break;
00348 
00349          case MultilayerPerceptron::MeanAndStandardDeviation:
00350          {
00351             outputError = outputSignalDerivative*((output-target)*standardDeviationOfOutputVariables)*2.0;
00352          }
00353 
00354          break;
00355 
00356          case MultilayerPerceptron::MinimumAndMaximum:
00357          {
00358             outputError = outputSignalDerivative*((output-target)*(maximumOfOutputVariables-minimumOfOutputVariables));
00359          }
00360 
00361          break;
00362       }       
00363  
00364       // Backpropagate the output errors to obtain the hidden errors
00365 
00366       // Last hidden layer
00367 
00368       for(int j = 0; j < numbersOfHiddenNeurons[numberOfHiddenLayers-1]; j++)
00369       {
00370          sum = 0.0;
00371 
00372          for(int k = 0; k < numberOfOutputs; k++)
00373          {
00374             synapticWeights = outputLayer[k].getSynapticWeights();
00375             sum += (synapticWeights[j])*outputError[k];
00376          }
00377 
00378          hiddenError[numberOfHiddenLayers-1][j] = outputSignalDerivativeFromHiddenLayer[numberOfHiddenLayers-1][j]*sum;
00379       }
00380 
00381       // Rest of hidden layers
00382 
00383       for(int h = numberOfHiddenLayers-2; h >= 0; h--) 
00384       {   
00385          for(int j = 0; j < numbersOfHiddenNeurons[h]; j++)
00386          {
00387             sum = 0.0;
00388 
00389             for(int k = 0; k < numbersOfHiddenNeurons[h+1]; k++)
00390             {
00391                synapticWeights = hiddenLayers[h+1][k].getSynapticWeights();
00392                sum += (synapticWeights[j])*hiddenError[h+1][k];
00393             }            
00394           
00395             hiddenError[h][j] = outputSignalDerivativeFromHiddenLayer[h][j]*sum;
00396          }
00397       }
00398 
00399       // Calculate gradient elements
00400 
00401       index = 0;
00402 
00403       // Calculate gradient elements of hidden neurons
00404 
00405       // First hidden layer
00406 
00407       for(int j = 0; j < numbersOfHiddenNeurons[0]; j++)
00408       {
00409          // Bias
00410 
00411          gradient[index] += hiddenError[0][j];
00412          index++;
00413 
00414          // Synaptic weights
00415 
00416          synapticWeights = hiddenLayers[0][j].getSynapticWeights();
00417 
00418          for(int k = 0; k < numberOfInputs; k++)
00419          {
00420             gradient[index] += hiddenError[0][j]*inputSignal[k];
00421             index++;   
00422          }
00423       }
00424 
00425       // Rest of hidden layers  
00426     
00427       for(int h = 1; h < numberOfHiddenLayers; h++)
00428       {      
00429          for(int j = 0; j < numbersOfHiddenNeurons[h]; j++)
00430          {
00431             // Bias
00432 
00433             gradient[index] += hiddenError[h][j];
00434             index++;
00435 
00436             // Synaptic weights
00437 
00438             synapticWeights = hiddenLayers[h][j].getSynapticWeights();
00439 
00440             for(int k = 0; k < numbersOfHiddenNeurons[h-1]; k++)
00441             {
00442                gradient[index] += hiddenError[h][j]*outputSignalFromHiddenLayer[h-1][k];
00443                index++;   
00444             }
00445          }
00446       }
00447 
00448       // Calculate gradient elements of output neurons
00449 
00450       for(int j = 0; j < numberOfOutputs; j++)
00451       {
00452          // Bias
00453 
00454          gradient[index] += outputError[j];
00455          index++;
00456 
00457          // Synaptic weights
00458 
00459          for(int k = 0; k < numbersOfHiddenNeurons[numberOfHiddenLayers-1]; k++)
00460          {
00461             gradient[index] += outputSignalFromHiddenLayer[numberOfHiddenLayers-1][k]*outputError[j];
00462             index++;
00463          }
00464       }
00465    }
00466 
00467    // Calculate sum squared norm
00468 
00469    double sumSquaredNorm = 0.0;
00470 
00471    for(int sample = 0; sample < numberOfSamples; sample++)
00472    {
00473       Vector<double> target = targetData.getRow(sample); 
00474        
00475       sumSquaredNorm += (target-meanOfTargetData).dot(target-meanOfTargetData);
00476    }
00477 
00478    gradient = gradient/sumSquaredNorm;
00479 
00480    return(gradient);
00481 }

00484 // void saveInputTargetAndOutput(char*) method
00485 
00496 
00497 void NormalizedSquaredError::saveInputTargetAndOutput(char* filename)
00498 {
00499    int numberOfOutputs = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfOutputs();
00500 
00501    int numberOfSamples = inputTargetDataSet->getNumberOfSamples();
00502    int numberOfInputVariables = inputTargetDataSet->getNumberOfInputVariables();
00503    int numberOfTargetVariables = inputTargetDataSet->getNumberOfTargetVariables();
00504 
00505    Matrix<double> inputData = inputTargetDataSet->getInputData();
00506    Matrix<double> targetData = inputTargetDataSet->getTargetData();
00507 
00508    Matrix<double> outputData(numberOfSamples, numberOfOutputs);
00509 
00510    Vector<double> input(numberOfInputVariables);
00511    Vector<double> output(numberOfTargetVariables);
00512 
00513    for(int sample = 0; sample < numberOfSamples; sample++)
00514    {
00515       input = inputData.getRow(sample);
00516 
00517       output = multilayerPerceptron->calculateOutput(input);
00518 
00519       outputData.setRow(sample, output);
00520    }
00521 
00522    std::fstream file;
00523 
00524    file.open(filename, std::ios::out);
00525 
00526    // Control sentence
00527 
00528    if(!file.is_open())
00529    {
00530       std::cout << std::endl
00531                 << "Flood Error NormalizedSquaredError class." << std::endl
00532                 << "void saveInputTargetAndOutput(char*) method." << std::endl
00533                 << "Cannot open input-target-output data file." << std::endl
00534                 << std::endl;
00535 
00536       exit(1);
00537    }
00538    else
00539    {
00540       if(display)
00541      {
00542          std::cout << std::endl
00543                    << "Saving input-target-output to data file..."
00544                    << std::endl;
00545      }
00546    }
00547 
00548    // Write file header
00549 
00550    file << "% Flood Neural Network. Input-target-output data file." << std::endl
00551         << "% 1 - Input data" << std::endl
00552         << "% 2 - Target data" << std::endl
00553         << "% 3 - Output data" << std::endl
00554         << std::endl;
00555 
00556    // Write file data
00557 
00558    for(int sample = 0; sample < numberOfSamples; sample++)
00559    {
00560       // Write sample input data
00561 
00562       for(int i = 0; i < numberOfInputVariables; i++)
00563       {
00564          file << inputData[sample][i] << " ";
00565       }
00566 
00567       // Write sample target data
00568 
00569       for(int i = 0; i < numberOfTargetVariables; i++)
00570       {
00571          file << targetData[sample][i] << " ";
00572       }
00573 
00574       // Write sample output data
00575 
00576       for(int i = 0; i < numberOfOutputs; i++)
00577       {
00578          file << outputData[sample][i] << " ";
00579       }
00580 
00581       file << std::endl;
00582    }
00583 
00584    file << std::endl;
00585 
00586    file.close();
00587 }
